description.value: Instantly browse and add step-by-step solution articles to your Zendesk Sell replies
description.title: app description

long_description.value:
About iorad
-----------------------

Instantly add step-by-step solution articles to your Zendesk Sell replies. No uploads. No screenshot editing. Assist your customers in real time.

Creating solution articles is extremely painful and time consuming. A 20 step article takes 1-2 hours to make. Take a screenshot, edit it, upload to your Zendesk Guide...rinse and repeat. Precious time wasted. Worst of all it’s your most valuable employee, a power user, thats tasked with doing this.

What if I told you iorad could speed this process -10X. That’s right. That same solution article could be done in minutes.

iorad for Sell
-----------------------
Instead of opening https://www.iorad.com to access your step-by-step tutorials, you may browse your tutorials directly in Sell Leads, Contacs, and Deals pages. The iorad panel located in Sell right side.
long_description.title: app long description

installation_instructions.value:
1. Sign up at https://www.iorad.com
2. Start creating your tutorial
3. Install *iorad for Sell*
4. Go to your Zendesk Sell, and browse your iorad tutorials from Leads, Contacts, or Deals page
installation_instructions.title: app installation instructions
